cast.name: 玛鲁莎·马耶尔 Marusa Majer
佩佳·拉博维奇 Petja Labovic

this_title: Ida Who Sang So Badly Even the Dead Rose up and Joined Her in Song
introduction: A period youth drama set in 1970s rural Slovenia, then part of Yugoslavia, and is an adaptation of the book Neither Voice, written by Suzana Tratnik.Our titular protagonist is an imaginative but tone-deaf ten-year-old girl who lives with her ailing grandma, to whom she is very attached emotionally. Persuaded by her schoolmate Terezka that song can ward off death, Ida joins the school choir in the hope that it will save her grandmother.
chinese_title: Ida Who Sang So Badly Even the Dead Rose up and Joined Her in Song
